subject: Re: [junit] Is it possible to automatically run two complete sets of tests?
msgSnippet: ... You seem to be missing the key question, which is not how to control the switch, but how to get JUnit to automatically execute all of the tests twice. --
messageBody:
Elliotte Harold wrote:
> Sounds like it's time to refactor so this isn't a problem. Make it a
> runtime configurable option, instead of something controlled by a
> property file. They're probably a few design patterns like abstract
> factory that might help out here.

You seem to be missing the key question, which is not how to
control the switch, but how to get JUnit to automatically
execute all of the tests twice.


--
Pat Farrell
http://www.pfarrell.com/
